name: Loyal Marines
background: The Loyal Marines are an arm of the Imperium's military, one of the best-equipped and best trained. They are genetically engineered for battle and created for the sole purpose of destroying the enemies of the Imperium.
strengths: The Loyal Marines have the tools for just about every situation, and can take on many types of foes. They are as flexible as you need them to be.
weaknesses: Loyal Marines tend to be quite tough and highly trained and as such, their units are often quite expensive and may find it difficult to field models to cover a large battlefield.

wolf_marines.name: Counter-attack Focus
wolf_marines.background: Loyal Marines focused on counter-attack tactics specialize in brutal counter-assaults in close combat.

psychic_marines.name: Psychic Focus
psychic_marines.background: Loyal Marines focused on psychic tactics and hunting demons.

alien_hunters.name: Alien Hunter Focus
alien_hunters.background: Loyal Marines focused on hunting aliens.

siege_masters.name: Siege Focus
siege_masters.background: Loyal Marines focused on psychic tactics and hunting demons.

fire_masters.name: Flame Focus
fire_masters.background: Loyal Marines focused on using fire to burn their enemies.

tactical_masters.name: Tactical Focus
tactical_masters.background: Loyal Marines focused on using tactics and cunning to outsmart their enemies.

mobility_masters.name: Mobility Focus
mobility_masters.background: Loyal Marines focused on using mobility and speed to outflank their enemies.

grav_captin.name: Prime Captain (Grav Armor)
grav_captin.description: A fearless next-generation leader in heavy Grav armor.

prime_surgeon.name: Prime Surgeon
prime_surgeon.description: A fearless next-generation surgeon trained in saving lives.

marine_squad.name: Marine Squad
marine_squad.description: Elite trained marines adept at fighting any enemies.

prime_marines.name: Prime Marine Squad
prime_marines.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed.

prime_assault_marines.name: Prime Assault Squad
prime_assault_marines.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed specialized in deadly close assault.

prime_reaper_squad.name: Prime Reaper Squad
prime_reaper_squad.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed specialized in fear and close fighting.

prime_infiltration_squad.name: Prime Infiltration Squad
prime_infiltration_squad.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

prime_guard_squad.name: Prime Blade Guardians
prime_guard_squad.description: Heavily armored elite trained marines of a new breed eqiupped with combat shields to protect them in close combat.

prime_eradicators.name: Prime Eradication Squad
prime_eradicators.description: Heavily armored marines with deadly anti-tank weaponry.

prime_blasters.name: Prime Blaster Squad
prime_blasters.description: Heavily armored marines with deadly anti-tank weaponry.

prime_interception_squad.name: Prime Interception Squad
prime_interception_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with carbines and jetpacks.

prime_suppression_squad.name: Prime Suppression Squad
prime_suppression_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with carbines and jetpacks.

prime_aggression_squad.name: Prime Aggression Squad
prime_aggression_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with carbines and jetpacks.

centurion_squad.name: Centurion Exosuit Squad
centurion_squad.description: Marines armed and armored like walking tanks.

prime_rider_squad.name: Prime Rider Squad
prime_rider_squad.description: Upgraded and highly trained bikers armed to the teeth.

marine_apc.name: APC
marine_apc.description: A durable transport built by the loyal marines.

marine_assault_apc.name: Assault APC
marine_assault_apc.description: A durable transport built by the loyal marines with upgraded weaponry.

marine_battle_tank.name: Battle Tank
marine_battle_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by loyal marines.

marine_heavy_tank.name: Heavy Assault APC
marine_heavy_tank.description: A heavily armored transport sporting an arsenal of weapons built by the loyal marines.

hover_apc.name: Hover APC
hover_apc.description: A durable transport with hover technology.

heavy_hover_apc.name: Heavy Hover APC
heavy_hover_apc.description: A heavy transport with hover technology and loaded out with many weapons.

heavy_hover_tank.name: Heavy Hover Tank
heavy_hover_tank.description: A heavy transport with hover technology and a large anti-tank weapon.

psychic_grand_master.name: Psychic Grand Master
psychic_grand_master.description: A Master of psychic powers and martial combat.

psychic_marine_squad.name: Psychic Marines
psychic_marine_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

purge_squad.name: Purge Marines
purge_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons with heavy psychic weapons.

teleport_squad.name: Teleport Squad
teleport_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers with teleporting backpack.

psychic_destroyers.name: Psychic Destroyers
psychic_destroyers.description: Marines in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

dread_walker.name: Dread Walker
dread_walker.description: A large psychic walker with heavy weapons and extreme combat prowess.

mobility_training.name: Mobility Training
mobility_training.description: This model and models in its unit gain +3 inch max range when shooting and +3 inches to charges.

combat_master.name: Combat Master
combat_master.description: When this unit fights in melee, choose one of the following bonuses: +1 to hit or +1 AP or +1 Damage on hits rolls of 1 or 2.

psych_out.name: Dangerous(Psychic)
psych_out.description: This weapon has +1 AP against units with the Psychic keyword.

banner_of_wrath.name: Banner of Wrath
banner_of_wrath.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" gain +1 Strength.

banner_of_focus.name: Banner of Focus
banner_of_focus.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" gain +1 Accuracy.

expert_marksman.name: Expert Marksman
expert_marksman.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" gain +1 to hit with shooting attacks.

grappling_hooks.name: Grappling Hooks
grappling_hooks.description: This unit may ignore vertical movement distances when moving.

prime_combat_shield.name: Prime Combat Shield
prime_combat_shield.description: Whenever this model loses a wound, roll a D10. On a 3 or less that wound is not lost.

ancient_armor.name: Ancient Armor
ancient_armor.description: This model may re-roll 1 failed Save roll.

relics.flavor: Ancient armour said to protect the wearer from significant harm.
A chainsword crafted to destroy even the toughest enemy infantry.
A trained marksman can have a very deadly effect.
A well-trained tactician in mobility warfare.
A trained fighter can dispatch even the toughest foes in deadly combat.

strategies.name: Tactical Flexibility
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may be split into two units of no less than the minimum size for that unit.
strategies.flavor: Marines often split off into small tactical units in order to cover more ground.

strategies.name: Special Ammunition
strategies.description: Use when shooting with an Infantry unit. Choose a weapon name to gain one of the following for this attack. That weapon ignores cover or that weapon gets +1 AP or that weapon gets +3" of range.
strategies.flavor: Equipped with special Alien Hunting armaments, they are trained to kill.

strategies.name: Psychic Channeling
strategies.flavor: With focus and energy, even the most difficult psychic powers can be manifested.
strategies.description: Use before a unit rolls for casting a psychic power. The spell charge value is increased by 1 and the spell has +3" of range.

strategies.name: Bolster
strategies.description: Use when an Infantry unit is targeted by an enemy. That unit may increase its cover level by 1 (none to soft, soft to hard).
strategies.flavor: A strong defensive position ensures greater survival, even against the toughest of weapons.

strategies.name: Devastation
strategies.description: Use before shooting with a unit. The target reduces its cover level by 1 (hard to soft, soft to none).
strategies.flavor: Finding and expoiting a vulnerable piece of cover can lead to devastating results.

strategies.name: Vigilance
strategies.description: Use when taking a Reflexes test. That unit is treated as having +2 Reflex for that test.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Genetically Engineered
strategies.description: Use before taking defense rolls for an Infantry unit. It gets +1 Save.
strategies.flavor: With the best implants and engineering that can be found, it's easy to take a hit and keep standing.

strategies.name: Destroy
strategies.description: Use before shooting at a target with Saveance 6 or greater. This attack gains +1 AP and +1 Damage.
strategies.flavor: Even the toughest armor has its weaknesses.

strategies.name: Psychic Aim
strategies.flavor: With psychic vision, some can even see their enemies through walls.
strategies.description: Use before a unit shoots. That unit may target units out of line of sight for this attack.

strategies.name: Hunters
strategies.description: Use when declaring a shoot or fight action. You may choose where hits are assigned.
strategies.flavor: With deadly precision, the alien hunters attack and kill their target with precision.

strategies.name: Expert Marksmen
strategies.description: Use before shooting with an Infantry unit. It gets +1 to hit.
strategies.flavor: Expertly trained and well-drilled, marines can focus and kill their target swiftly.

strategies.name: Psychic Fury
strategies.flavor: The psyker explodes with energy, infused with additonal power.
strategies.description: Use when activating a unit with the Psychic keyword. That unit may cast one additional psychic power.

banish.name: Banish
banish.description: Target enemy unit within 12" gets -1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

cleanse.name: Cleanse
cleanse.description: Target enemy unit within 12 takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

warp.name: Warp
warp.description: Target friendly unit may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain.

doom.name: Doom
doom.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

strike.name: Strike
strike.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately shoot.

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Target 2 enemy units within 9" take 5 automatic hits with AP 1 each.

might.name: Mighty Strength
might.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Strength for its next attack.

fortify.name: Fortify Courage
fortify.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Courage until the of the round.

void.name: Exploit Weakness
void.description: Target enemy unit within 18" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.

storm.name: Psychic Storm
storm.description: Target 2 enemy units within 9" take 4 hits each with AP 1.

bolt.name: Psychic Bolt
bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 1 hit with AP 7 and Damage 3.
